name: Sonic Labyrinth
description:
Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) has tricked Sonic into wearing a pair of
magical sneakers that prevent him from running at super-sonic speeds.
The only things that can remove these sluggish shoes and restore Sonic's
speed are the Chaos Emeralds hidden within Dr. Eggman's Super Labyrinth.
Spin through four labyrinth zones, each containing three regular stages
and a Boss stage. Seek out square warp gates to find special items, and
earn extra lives by grabbing 100 rings in Bonus stages. Find the Chaos
Emeralds before time runs out!
This game is only playable in 2D.This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
